text: Trevor Slattery is a fictional character created for the Marvel Cinematic Universe movie Iron Man 3 and the 2014 Marvel One-Shot All Hail the King. He posed as the Mandarin in the movie to prevent racist stereotypes towards East Asians. He was played by Ben Kingsley. ==Biography== Trevor Slattery is a washed-up British actor handpicked by Aldrich Killian to fake the identity of the Mandarin of the Ten Rings. ==Reception== Trevor Slattery is a fan-favorite but Marvel purists aren't happy that he isn't actually the Mandarin.
